laboratory_examinations.findings: Prothrombin time 11.6 seconds, activated partial thromboplastin time 24.5 seconds
BUN 79.4 mg/dL, creatinine 8.31 mg/dL, estimated glomerular filtration rate 5.87 mL/min/1.7 m2, LDH 6260 U/L, total bilirubin 2.6 mg/dL, AST 250 U/L, ALT 41 U/L
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum creatinine increased to 13.97 mg/dL over time, decreased after hemodialysis to 0.78 mg/dL after two weeks post-discharge

laboratory_examinations.findings: Urine analysis showed dark-amber color, specific gravity 1.012, pH 6.5, leukocyte esterase 2+, nitrite 2+, protein 1+, blood 2+
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Urinalysis at tertiary hospital indicated amber color, specific gravity 1.009, pH 6.5, WBC ester 3+, nitrite - , protein 2+, blood 4+

laboratory_examinations.findings: Serum antinuclear antibodies, anti-double stranded DNA antibodies, anti-neutrophil cytoplasmic antibodies, anti-glomerular basement membrane antibodies, rheumatoid factor all negative. ADAMTS13 activity 44.4%. E.coli O157:H7 negative. CH50 47.8 U/mL.
Acute tubular necrosis (ATN) with hemosiderin deposition.
